title: Instant Pot Chicken Breasts (Frozen & Fresh)
directions: Place all ingredients in pressure cooker.
Close lid and turn vent to sealed.
For Frozen Chicken, cook on high pressure for 10 minutes.
For Fresh Chicken, cook on high pressure for 6 minutes (if thinner pieces of chicken).
Allow to release naturally for 5 minutes, and then do a quick release if needed.
Remove chicken from liquid and rest chicken for 5-10 minutes.
Slice and serve or shred with 1/2 cup cooking liquid.
ingredients: 1 cup pineapple juice or chicken stock
2 teaspoons kosher salt 1 teaspoon if using chicken stock
